head.supplied: The Free German Academy ¶ for Sciences, Arts and general Culture in ¶ Goethe's parental home ¶ to Baron Ferd von Mueller Director of the Royal botanic garden ¶ Melbourne...

div.p: Freies Deutsches Hochstift Frankfurter Goethemuseum, Frankfurt am Main.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: für Wissenschaften, Künste und allgemeine Bildung in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Letter not found; MS is a file copy kept by the Academy. MS annotation: 'No. 546 exped. d. 8/5. 83' [sent 8 May 1883].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Unter bescheinigung des Empfanges Ihrer geehrten Sendung vom 24 v Mtn "Systematic Census of Australian Plants" welche wir unserer Bibliothek überwiesen haben. danken wir Ihnen verbindlichst und bitten um Erhaltung Ihres ferneren gütigen Wohlwollens für unsere Stiftung.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: for Sciences, Arts and general Culture in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: to Baron Ferd von Mueller Director of the Royal botanic garden

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Under certification of receipt of your esteemed consignment of 24 of previous month "Systematic Census of Australian Plants"
B83.03.04. which we have transferred to our library we thank you kindly and request support of your further kindly goodwill for our academy.
